name: UDC Jam Week #1 - One Finger Play Much
name_original: UDC Jam Week #1 - One Finger Play Much
description:
Play in FullScreen it's better because of some issues with the UI, sorry!

It's a game about multiple games in one!
You'll play a game, maybe another. And why not both?!

Hint: Try to get up to level 5! (Should take about 1:30 min)
